name: Send emails with SendPulse for new Google Sheets rows.
description: For every contact added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically send an email with SendPulse. This template requires to make a copy of this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Ic_j-dIVksA-uS86HoclPkbu7ArYG7KQ0tpRIlO86nk/edit#gid=0).
